{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Google |model=Home |revision=Mini (H0A) |asin= |newegg=9SIA10V6RS5833 |price=49 |est_release_date=09/2017 |fcc_date=09/20/2017 |is_manuf=No |type=media streamer, IoT hub, wireless speakers, |fcc_id=A4RH0A |ic_id=10395A-H0A |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.8 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88DE3006;88DE3006-BTK2; |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=TC58NVG1S3HBA16 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TC4G63CFR-PBA |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8887;88W8887-NAA2; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |addl_chips=Audio Amplifier;Texas Instruments;TAS5720;;1; ,,, LED Lighting Drivers Controller;NXP;PCA9956BTW;;1; |flags=Bluetooth 4.1 LE, DFS (slave), Microphone, Speaker |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |oui= }} {{TagLine|Wireless Smart Speaker}} :{{ProductPage|https://store.google.com/product/google_home_mini}}
''Personal Home Assistant - Digital Media Streamer'' *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/A4R-H0A A4R-H0A] (2017-09-20) - Multimedia Device
"Model: H0A" is visible in photos of the base of the device in [https://www.theverge.com/2017/10/4/16405218/new-google-home-mini-max-speakers-photos-video-hands-on this article] <!--{{FCC ST|03/17/2018|indexme.}}-->
===Specifications=== *Wi-Fi: 802.11abgn/ac Dual-Band (2.4/5GHz); Bluetooth 4.1 LE *Drivers: 1x 1.58" (40mm) driver; Connectors: 1x Micro-USB port *Audio Format: HE-AAC, LC-AAC+, MP3, FLAC, Vorbis, WAV (LPCM) *Voice Control: Far-field Voice recognition supports hands-free use *Supported Operating Systems: Android 4.2, iOS 9.1 and higher *Requirements: Router for Wi-Fi use, Google Home app running *Power Requirements: DC 5V 1.8A; Power Cord Length: 1.5m *Dimensions (Ø x H): 98 mm x 42 mm; Weight Device: 173 g
===Reviews=== *[https://www.theverge.com/2017/10/4/16405218/new-google-home-mini-max-speakers-photos-video-hands-on ''First look at Google Home Mini and Max'' on '''The Verge'''] *[https://medium.com/@justlv/google-home-mini-teardown-comparison-to-echo-dot-and-giving-technology-a-voice-c59a23724a26 ''Google Home Mini teardown, comparison to Echo Dot'' on '''Medium'''] :CPU: [[Marvell]] 88DE3006 ([[Synaptics]] BG2CDP) @1.2GHz :Dual Core ARM Cortex-A7 (Armada 1500 Mini Plus) *[https://www.allaboutcircuits.com/news/teardown-tuesday-google-home-mini/ ''Teardown'' on '''AllAboutCircuits'''] (PCB images) :CPU: [[Marvell]] 88DE3006-BTK2 (Armada 1500 Mini Plus) :Flash: [[Toshiba]] TC58NVG1S3HBA16 :RAM: [[Samsung]] K4B4G1646E-BYK0 :Wi-Fi/BT Combo Chip: [[Marvell]] 88W8897 (?) :Antenna Switch: [[Skyworks]] SKY3438 :Audio Amplifier: [[Texas Instruments]] TAS5720 :LED Driver: [[NXP]] PCA9955BTW :MEMS Microphones: S19548562
===See also=== *[[Google Home]] • [https://www.engadget.com/2016/11/03/google-home-review/ Engadget] *[[Google Home Max (H0B)]] • [https://www.engadget.com/2017/12/19/google-home-max-review/ Engadget] *[[Google Home Mini (H0A)]] • [https://teardowns.abiresearch.com/teardowns/pe_googleteardown-home-mini-h0a-0/ ABI] • [https://medium.com/@justlv/google-home-mini-teardown-comparison-to-echo-dot-and-giving-technology-a-voice-c59a23724a26 Medium] *[[Google OnHub]] • [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32823-google-tp-link-onhub-router-reviewed SmallNetBuilder] • [https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/OnHub+Teardown/48129 iFixit] *[[Google Pixel Buds]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/SZGG015B SZGG015B] • [https://medium.com/@justlv/google-pixel-buds-teardown-396183cbbc18 Medium]
